00055     /**
00056      * connect to the database
00057      */
00058     function connect() {
00059         $this->link = mssql_connect($this->dbconfig['host'], $this->dbconfig['login'], $this->dbconfig['password']);
00060         if (!$this->link) {
00061             throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not connect to server " . $this->dbconfig['host']);
00062         }
00063         if (!empty ($this->dbconfig['database'])) {
00064             $db = $this->dbconfig['database'];
00065             if ($db[0] != '[') {
00066                 $db = '['.$db.']';
00067             }
00068             if (!mssql_select_db($db, $this->link)) {
00069                 throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not select Database " . $this->dbconfig['database']);
00070             }
00071         }
00072 
00073         if (!empty ($this->dbconfig['encoding'])) {
00074             $this->setEncoding($this->dbconfig['encoding']);
00075         }
00076 
00077         //freetds hack: freetds does not offer this function :(
00078         if (!function_exists("mssql_next_result")) {
00079             function mssql_next_result($res = null) {
00080                 return false;
00081             }
00082         }
00083     }
00084 
00085     function isConnected() {
00086         return (bool) $this->link;
00087     }
00088 
00089     /**
00090      * return the current link to the database, connect first if needed
00091      */
00092     public function getLink() {
00093         if (!$this->link) {
00094             $this->connect();
00095         }
00096         return $this->link;
00097     }

00100          * inject db link into dbo

00102     public function setLink($l) {

00106     /**
00107      * execute this query
00108      * @return mixed
00109      */
00110     private function execute($sql) {
00111         if (!$this->link) {
00112             $this->connect();
00113         }
00114 
00115         $start = microtime(true);
00116         $this->result = mssql_query($sql, $this->link);
00117 
00118         if (false === $this->result) {
00119             $msg = mssql_get_last_message();
00120             //TODO another way would be to check @@ERROR for errors 2601/2627 which is ALSO language dependend *facepalm*  
00121             if (stripos($msg,'duplicate') !== false) {
00122                 DatabaseDuplicateException($msg);               
00123             } else {
00124                 writeLog($msg . ': ' . $sql, KATA_ERROR);
00125                 throw new DatabaseErrorException($msg,$sql);
00126             }
00127         }
00128         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00129             $this->queries[] = array (
00130                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00131                 trim($sql),
00132                 '',
00133                 mssql_get_last_message(),
00134                  (microtime(true) - $start) . 'sec'
00135             );
00136         }
00137     }

00143         //TODO

00146     /**
00147      * return numbers of rows affected by last query
00148      * @return int
00149      */
00150     private function lastAffected() {
00151         if ($this->link) {
00152             if (function_exists('mssql_rows_affected')) {
00153                 return mssql_rows_affected($this->link);
00154             } else {
00155                 $result = mssql_query("select @@rowcount as rows", $this->link);
00156                 $rows = mssql_fetch_assoc($result);
00157                 return $rows['rows'];
00158             }
00159         }
00160         $null = null;
00161         return $null;
00162     }
00163 
00164     /**
00165      * return id of primary key of last insert
00166      * @return int
00167      */
00168     private function lastInsertId() {
00169         $this->execute("select SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS id");
00170         if ($this->result) {
00171             $res = mssql_fetch_assoc($this->result);
00172             if ($res) {
00173                 $id = $res['id'];
00174                 if ($this->result) {
00175                     mssql_free_result($this->result);
00176                 }
00177                 return $id;
00178             }
00179         }
00180         return null;
00181     }
00182 
00183     /**
00184      * return the result of the last query.
00185      * @param mixed $idname if $idname is false keys are simply incrementing from 0, if $idname is string the key is the value of the column specified in the string
00186      */
00187     private function & lastResult($idnames = false) {
00188         do {
00189             $result = array ();
00190             if (@mssql_num_rows($this->result) > 0) {
00191                 if ($idnames === false) {
00192                     while ($row = mssql_fetch_assoc($this->result)) {
00193                         $result[] = $row;
00194                     }
00195                 } else {
00196                     while ($row = mssql_fetch_assoc($this->result)) {
00197                         $current = & $result;
00198                         foreach ($idnames as $idname) {
00199                             if (!isset($row[$idname])) {
00200                                 throw new InvalidArgumentException('Cant order result by a field thats not in the resultset (forgot to select it?)');
00201                             }
00202                             if ($row[$idname] === null) {
00203                                 $row[$idname] = 'null';
00204                             }
00205                             $current = & $current[$row[$idname]];
00206                         }
00207                         $current = $row;
00208                     } //while
00209                 } //idnames!=false
00210             } //num_rows>0
00211         } //do
00212         while (mssql_next_result($this->result));
00213         return $result;
00214     }
00215     /**
00216      * REPLACE works like INSERT,
00217      * except that if an old row in the table has the same value as a new row for a PRIMARY KEY or a UNIQUE index,
00218      * the old row is deleted before the new row is inserted
00219      *
00220      * @param string $tableName replace from this table
00221      * @param array $fields name=>value pairs of new values
00222      * @param string $pairs enquoted names to escaped pairs z.B.[name]='value'
00223      * @return int modified rows.
00224      */
00225     function replace($tableName, $fields, $pairs) {
00226         throw new Exception('Not easily supportable on MSSQL. Direct your thanks for this to Microsoft.');
00227     }
00228 
00229     /**
00230      * execute query and return useful data depending on query-type
00231      *
00232      * @param string $s sql-statement
00233      * @param string $idname which field-value to use as the key of the returned array (false=dont care)
00234      * @return array
00235      */
00236     function & query($s, $idnames = false, $fields = false) {
00237         $result = null;
00238         switch ($this->getSqlCommand($s)) {
00239             case 'update' :
00240             case 'delete' :
00241             case 'alter':
00242                 $this->execute($s);
00243                 $result = $this->lastAffected();
00244                 break;
00245             case 'insert' :
00246                 $this->execute($s);
00247                 $result = $this->lastInsertId();
00248                 break;
00249             case 'select' :
00250             case 'exec':
00251             case 'execute':
00252             case 'show':
00253             case '/*page*/if' :
00254                 if (is_string($idnames)) {
00255                     $idnames = array (
00256                         $idnames
00257                     );
00258                 }
00259                 $this->execute($s);
00260                 $result = $this->lastResult($idnames, $fields);
00261                 break;
00262             default :
00263                 $this->execute($s);
00264                 $result = $this->result;
00265                 break;
00266         }
00267         return $result;
00268     }

00270     /**
00271      * escape the given string so it can be safely appended to any sql
00272      * @param string $sql string to escape
00273      * @return string
00274      */
00275     function escape($sql) {
00276         return str_replace("'", "''", $sql); //seems odd but in mssql a single ' can be escaped by another
00277     }

00279     /**
00280      * output any queries made, how long it took, the result and any errors if DEBUG
00281      */
00282     function __destruct() {
00283         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00284             array_unshift($this->queries, array (
00285                 'line',
00286                 '',
00287                 'affected',
00288                 'error',
00289                 'time'
00290             ));
00291             kataDebugOutput($this->queries, true);
00292         }
00293         if ((bool) $this->link) {
00294             if (is_resource($this->link) && (get_resource_type($this->link) == 'mssql link')) {
00295                 mssql_close($this->link);
00296             }
00297             $this->link = null;
00298         }
00299     }

00301     /**
00302      * return the Sql-Command of given Query
00303      * @param string $sql query
00304      * @return string Sql-Command
00305      */
00306     private function getSqlCommand($sql) {
00307         $sql = str_replace(array (
00308             "(",
00309             "\t",
00310             "\n"
00311         ), " ", $sql);
00312         $Sqlparts = explode(" ", trim($sql));
00313         return strtolower($Sqlparts[0]);
00314     }
00315 
00316     /**
00317      * build a sql-string that returns first matching row
00318      * @param string $sql query
00319      * @param string $perPage expression
00320      * @return string (limited) Query
00321      */
00322     function getFirstRowQuery($sql, $perPage) {
00323         //TODO UNION,EXCEPT,INTERSECT... not implemented, mostly not supported anyway
00324         $command = $this->getSqlCommand($sql);
00325         $validTopComands = array (
00326             'select' => 1,
00327             'insert' => 1,
00328             'update' => 1,
00329             'delete' => 1,
00330             'merge' => 1
00331         );
00332         //set TOP after first Command
00333         if (isset($validTopComands[$command])) {
00334             $first = mb_strpos(strtolower($sql), $command);
00335             $firstPart = mb_substr($sql, 0, $first);
00336             $secondPart = mb_substr($sql, ($first +strlen($command)));
00337             return $firstPart . $command . " TOP(" . $perPage . ")" . $secondPart;
00338         }
00339         return $sql;
00340     }
00341 
00342     /**
00343      * build a sql-string that returns paged data
00344      * every computed output has to be named !!! so 'max(x)' has to be 'max(x) as maxX' or something like that...
00345      *
00346      * some warnings/comments from dietmar riess:
00347      * IF There is no IDENTITY FIELD we can numbering Rows with temp Table
00348      * IF There is an IDENTITY FIELD we have to execute the much slower EXCEPT Query
00349      * Also we know there is an IDENTITY FIELD we can't use it, because we do not! know which column it is !
00350      *
00351      * @see getPageQuery Interface
00352      * @param boolean $orderd true is depreacated fliping TOPS
00353      * @return string finished query
00354      */
00355     function getPageQuery($sql, $page, $perPage) {
00356         $command = $this->getSqlCommand($sql);
00357         if ($command != "select") {
00358             throw new InvalidArgumentException('paging is not possible for given query');
00359             return $sql;
00360         }
00361         $fastQuery = $this->getFirstRowQuery($sql, 1);
00362         $fastInsertQuery = 'IF OBJECT_ID(\'tempdb..#temp\') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #temp;SELECT * INTO #temp FROM (' . $fastQuery . ') as a';
00363         $this->execute($fastInsertQuery);
00364         $ID = $this->lastInsertId();
00365         if ($ID === null) {
00366             $fastQuery = $this->getFirstRowQuery($sql, $page * $perPage);
00367             $tmptable = '/*PAGE*/IF OBJECT_ID(\'tempdb..#table\') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #table;SELECT IDENTITY(int,1,1) as tempRowNumID,* INTO #table FROM (' . $fastQuery . ') as a;';
00368             $tmptableAndQuery = $tmptable . 'SELECT * FROM #table where tempRowNumID between ' . (($page -1) * $perPage +1) . ' AND ' . (($page) * $perPage);
00369             return $tmptableAndQuery;
00370         } else {
00371             $topPages = $this->getFirstRowQuery($sql, $page * $perPage);
00372             $lastPages = $this->getFirstRowQuery($sql, ($page -1) * $perPage);
00373             $Query = 'SELECT * FROM (' . $topPages . ') as a EXCEPT SELECT * FROM (' . $lastPages . ') as a';
00374             return $Query;
00375         }
00376     }
00377     /**
00378      * return the sql needed to convert a unix timestamp to datetime
00379      * @param integer $t unixtime
00380      * @return string
00381      */
00382     function makeDateTime($t) {
00383         //may lie to you: mssql does not calculate summertime
00384         return "CONVERT(char(20),dateadd(ss," . $t . "+DATEDIFF(ss, GetUtcDate(), GetDate()),'1970-01-01 00:00:00'),120)";
00385     }

00387     /**
00388      * try to reduce the fields of given table to the basic types bool, unixdate, int, string, float, date, enum
00389      *
00390      * <code>example:
00391      *
00392     Array
00393      * (
00394      *     [table] => test
00395      *     [primary] => a
00396      *     [cols] => Array
00397      *         (
00398      *             [a] => Array
00399      *                 (
00400      *                     [default] => CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
00401      *                     [null] =>
00402      *                     [length] => 0
00403      *                     [type] => date
00404      *                 )
00405      *
00406      *             [g] => Array
00407      *                 (
00408      *                     [default] =>
00409      *                     [null] =>
00410      *                     [length] => 0
00411      *                     [type] => unsupported:time
00412      *                 )
00413      *         )
00414      *
00415      * )
00416      * </code>
00417      *
00418      * @param string $tableName name of the table to analyze
00419      * @return unknown
00420      */
00421     function & describe($tableName) {
00422         $primaryKey = array ();
00423         $identity = null;
00424         $desc = array ();
00425         $cols = array ();
00426         $tableName = $this->dequote($tableName);
00427         /*possibly incomplete*/
00428         $sql = "Select a.COLUMN_NAME,a.[IS_NULLABLE],a.[COLUMN_DEFAULT],a.[DATA_TYPE],a.[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH],a.[NUMERIC_PRECISION],b.[CONSTRAINT_NAME],COLUMNPROPERTY(OBJECT_ID('" . $tableName . "'),a.COLUMN_NAME, 'IsIdentity') as [identity]
00429                                         From INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS a left join INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE as b on (a.COLUMN_NAME = b.COLUMN_NAME AND a.TABLE_NAME=b.TABLE_NAME)
00430                                         where a.TABLE_NAME='" . $tableName . "'";
00431         /*tested this do it ,cause CONSTRAINT_NAME can be defined by user!(fehlender Beweis für:"unkorrelierte Subqueries werden nur einmal ausgeführt")
00432         $sql = "Select a.COLUMN_NAME,[IS_NULLABLE],[COLUMN_DEFAULT],[DATA_TYPE],[CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH],[NUMERIC_PRECISION],[CONSTRAINT_NAME],[CONSTRAINT_TYPE],a.COLUMN_NAME, 'IsIdentity') as [identity]
00433                         from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS a left join
00434                             (SELECT a.COLUMN_NAME,b.CONSTRAINT_TYPE,b.CONSTRAINT_NAME
00435                             from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CONSTRAINT_COLUMN_USAGE as a,INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS as b
00436                             where a.TABLE_NAME='".$tableName."' AND a.TABLE_CATALOG = db_name()
00437                             AND b.TABLE_NAME='".$tableName."' AND b.TABLE_CATALOG = db_name()
00438                             AND b.CONSTRAINT_NAME=a.CONSTRAINT_NAME
00439                             )as b on (a.COLUMN_NAME = b.COLUMN_NAME)
00440                         where a.TABLE_NAME='".$tableName."' AND a.TABLE_CATALOG =db_name()";
00441         */
00442         $r = mssql_query($sql, $this->getLink());
00443         if (false === $r) {
00444             throw new Exception('model: cant describe, missing rights?');
00445         }
00446         $noResult = true;
00447         while ($row = mssql_fetch_assoc($r)) {
00448             $noResult = false;
00449             $data = array ();
00450             $data['default'] = empty ($row['COLUMN_DEFAULT']) ? false : $row['COLUMN_DEFAULT'];
00451             $data['null'] = 'NO' != $row['IS_NULLABLE'];
00452             $data['length'] = 0;
00453             if ($row['identity'] == 1) {
00454                 $identity = $row['COLUMN_NAME'];
00455             }
00456             /*deprecated
00457             if('UNIQUE' == $row['CONSTRAINT_TYPE'] ){
00458                 if(!isset($uniqueKeys[$row['CONSTRAINT_NAME']])){
00459                     $uniqueKeys[$row['CONSTRAINT_NAME']] = array();
00460                 }
00461                 $uniqueKeys[$row['CONSTRAINT_NAME']][] = $row['COLUMN_NAME'];
00462             }
00463             if ('PRIMARY KEY' == $row['CONSTRAINT_TYPE']) {
00464                 $primaryKey[] = $row['COLUMN_NAME'];
00465             }
00466             */
00467             //keys
00468             $data['key'] = null;
00469             if (isset ($row['CONSTRAINT_NAME'])) {
00470                 $key = substr($row['CONSTRAINT_NAME'], 0, 2);
00471                 if ($key == 'PK') {
00472                     $primaryKey[] = $row['COLUMN_NAME'];
00473                     $data['key'] = 'PRI';
00474                 } else
00475                     if ($key == 'UQ') {
00476                         $data['key'] = 'UNI';
00477                     }
00478             }
00479             //types
00480             switch ($row['DATA_TYPE']) {
00481                 case 'bit' :
00482                     $data['type'] = 'bool';
00483                     $data['length'] = $row['NUMERIC_PRECISION'];
00484                     break;
00485                 case 'bigint' :
00486                 case 'int' :
00487                 case 'smallint' :
00488                 case 'tinyint' :
00489                     $data['length'] = $row['NUMERIC_PRECISION'];
00490                     $data['type'] = 'int';
00491                     break;
00492                 case 'char' :
00493                 case 'varchar' :
00494                     $data['length'] = $row['CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH'];
00495                     $data['type'] = 'string';
00496                     break;
00497                 case 'text' :
00498                     $data['type'] = 'text';
00499                     break;
00500                 case 'float' :
00501                 case 'real' :
00502                     $data['length'] = $row['NUMERIC_PRECISION'];
00503                     $data['type'] = 'float';
00504                     break;
00505                 case 'date' :
00506                 case 'datetime' :
00507                 case 'datetime2' :
00508                 case 'smalldatetime' :
00509                 case 'datetimeoffset' :
00510                 case 'time' :
00511                     $data['type'] = 'date';
00512             }
00513             $cols[$row['COLUMN_NAME']] = $data;
00514         }
00515 
00516         if ($noResult === true) {
00517             throw new Exception('table does not exists in selected Database');
00518         }
00519         $desc = array (
00520             'table' => str_replace(array (
00521                 $this->quoteLeft,
00522                 $this->quoteRight
00523             ), '', $tableName),
00524             'primary' => $primaryKey,
00525             'identity' => $identity,
00526             'cols' => $cols
00527         );
00528         return $desc;
00529     }

00531     /**
00532      * a copy of the matching db-config entry in config/database.php
00533      * @param string $what spezifies what to get ... null=complete config array
00534      * @return array|string
00535      */
00536     function getConfig($what = null) {
00537         if (!empty ($what)) {
00538             return (isset ($this->dbconfig[$what])) ? $this->dbconfig[$what] : '';
00539         }
00540         return $this->dbconfig;
00541     }

00544      * set db-config entry
00545      * @param $array $config
00546      */
00547     function setConfig($config) {
00548         if (empty ($this->dbconfig)) {
00549             $this->dbconfig = $config;
00550         }

00553     /**
00554      * used to quote table and field names
00555      * @param string $s string to enquote;
00556      * @return string enquoted string
00557      */
00558     function quoteName($s) {
00559         return $this->quoteLeft . $s . $this->quoteRight;
00560     }
00561 
00562     /**
00563      * checks if given operator is valid
00564      * @param string $operator
00565      * @return boolean
00566      */
00567     function isValidOperator($operator) {
00568         if (empty ($operator)) {
00569             return false;
00570         }
00571         $ops = array (
00572             '=' => 1,
00573             '>' => 1,
00574             '<' => 1,
00575             '>=' => 1,
00576             '<=' => 1,
00577             '<>' => 1,
00578             '!=' => 1,
00579             '!<' => 1,
00580             '>!' => 1,
00581             'is null' => 1,
00582             'is not null' => 1,
00583             'between' => 1,
00584             'in' => 1,
00585             'not in' => 1,
00586             'like' => 1,
00587             'not like' => 1
00588         );
00589         return isset($ops[$operator]);
00590     }
